mapper.select: SELECT fran_sales_mock.sales_code ,fran_sales_mock.hq_goods_code ,hq_goods.hq_goods_code ,hq_goods.hq_goods_name ,fran_sales_mock.sales_amount ,fran_sales_mock.sales_date FROM fran_sales_mock, hq_goods WHERE fran_code = #{fran_code}
SELECT count(*) FROM fran_sales_mock, hq_goods WHERE fran_code = #{fran_code}

SELECT fran_sales_mock.sales_code ,fran_sales_mock.hq_goods_code ,hq_goods.hq_goods_code ,hq_goods.hq_goods_name ,fran_sales_mock.sales_amount ,fran_sales_mock.sales_date FROM fran_sales_mock, hq_goods WHERE fran_code = #{fran_code}
